resources.string: Chop roma tomatoes and \nplace in a bowl adding herbs, garlic, balsamic \nvinegar, basil, and olive oil.

Chop roma tomatoes and place in a bowl adding herbs, garlic, balsamic vinegar, basil, and olive oil. Mix making sure to coat ingredients evenly then set aside. Slice 2 inch long pockets into chicken breasts and brush with olive oil. Spoon the bruschetta mixture in to the chicken and place in a baking sheet. Bake for 40 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Add some mozzerella cheese to the chicken when it has around 10 minutes left for a cheesy delight! Spoon the bruschetta mixture in to the chicken and place in a baking sheet. Bake for 40 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Add some mozzerella cheese to the chicken when it has around 10 minutes left for a cheesy delight!
